The black defender is a defender made of black metal. It is similar to a dagger, but held in the off-hand in place of a shield. It requires 10 Attack and 10 Defence to wield. The black defender is dropped by Cyclopes on the top floor of the Warriors' Guild, but only once you have obtained a Steel defender.

If the player dies below level 20 Wilderness, it will remain in the player's inventory. However, the item will be unusable and must be repaired with 5,000 coins by using the item on Perdu.

The black defender does not count as an "evil" item in Shadow of the Storm despite its colour.

The '''black defender''' is a [[defender]] made of black metal. It is similar to a dagger, but held in the off-hand in place of a shield. It requires 10 [[Attack]] and 10 [[Defence]] to wield. The black defender is dropped by [[Cyclops|Cyclopes]] on the top floor of the [[Warriors' Guild]], but only once you have obtained a [[Steel defender]].

If the player dies below level 20 [[Wilderness]], it will remain in the player's inventory. However, the item will be unusable and must be repaired with 5,000 coins by using the item on [[Perdu]].

The black defender does not count as an "evil" item in [[Shadow of the Storm]] despite its colour.
